revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Column I:;Through Aion son of Sarapion;Elias tal. 6,550;Aion son of Sarapion tal. 45,200;Heras son of Sarapion tal. 8,300;Sokrates tal. 24,600;Leein tal. 1,600;Amatas tal. 19,500 (cancelled);Atolas tal. 400; Total, tal. 106,250; tal. 86,650;Aion son of Sarapion, receiver;Aion [ ];Tamaleis [ ];Atisis [ ];Heras son of Sarapion tal. 780;Termou[thion tal.] 6,400;Nilammon tal. 30,100.;Column II:;In the name of Kollouthes,;through Tapaeis tal. 9,300;And for the name of Heras tal. 1,250;Likewise Tapaeis for the two names tal. 10,600;Receipts of Aion son of Sarapion:;Titoueis tal. 50,850;Pankratis tal. 14,216;Heras son of Sarapion tal. 5,400;Heras son of Hol tal. 3,700;Total tal. 70,500. Another tal. 3,700.
